turns.speaker: STEVIE
turns.text: What are they doing here?

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: Security.  Join the Marines and see the Zoo ...

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: Go easy, Stevie.

turns.speaker: STEVIE
turns.text: They look pretty docile.

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: Yes, but don't take any chances.

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: We shall want a full autopsy ...

turns.speaker: STEVIE
turns.text: With particular emphasis on the cranial and oral areas.

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: Keep him in cold storage till the reports in.  Then send him to Taxidermy.  He's a museum piece.

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: But he isn't us.  He's your own kind.

turns.speaker: ZIRA
turns.text: He's a gorilla.

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: I mean he's of your race. He's an Ape.  Look.  You don't have to be afraid.  We've put him in chains and under sedation. Do you understand that?

turns.speaker: ZIRA
turns.text: I should.  I've been doing it half my life to Humans.

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: Humans?

turns.speaker: ZIRA
turns.text: I'm a psychiatrist.

turns.speaker: ZIRA
turns.text: Primitive?

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: I mean that in our 'primitive' civilization, apes just don't talk. I mean I think it's important that, when our 'primitive' security precautions are lifted, the first time you say something in public you should talk to what we 'primitively' call the Right People.

turns.speaker: ZIRA
turns.text: May I say something personal?

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: Please

turns.speaker: ZIRA
turns.text: I like you.

turns.speaker: BRAZEN
turns.text: ComStat did a psychosearch on him. Used a database of 5 million sociopathic personalities. He hit the bottom of the curve.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Perfect for the mission. Nobody else can pull it off - not an army, not a man.

turns.speaker: BRAZEN
turns.text: Zero emotional developments. Total lack of compassion. A highly developed psychopathic instinct to survive.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Somehow during the tour, she came into possession of a prototype transmitting device. We don't know how.

turns.speaker: BRAZEN
turns.text: Utopia became depressed after her mother's suicide, began to withdraw into her virtual reality simulator. She'd punch up her own little world in cyberspace and stay in it for days at a time.  Somebody else was in there with her.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: The cigarette girl in New Vegas was an undercover cop. She injected you with incentive toxin. Right now it's swimming in your bloodstream. It'll start to take effect in 9 hours.

turns.speaker: BRAZEN
turns.text: It's a strain of the Plutoxin 7 virus. Genetically engineered. 100% pure death. Complete nervous system shutdown. You crash and bleed out like a stuck pig. Not a pretty sight.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: L.A. is in a constant state of warfare. Gangs fighting for the right to rule.

turns.speaker: BRAZEN
turns.text: Heavy Third World connections. They get weapons, drugs, fuel, choppers - everything is pumped into the island from the south.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Some areas have power - they're on line to San Onofre.

turns.speaker: BRAZEN
turns.text: His reactor's starting to overheat.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Plissken, slow down the sub. You're overloading the power plant.

turns.speaker: BRAZEN
turns.text: You were injected with glucose. There is no Plutoxin 7 virus. You were never going to die - at least not from anything we gave you.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: C'mon, Snake - it's L.A. Everything's phony, you know that.

turns.speaker: UTOPIA
turns.text: Who's that?

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: You never heard of Snake Plissken?

turns.speaker: UTOPIA
turns.text: He doesn't look like his picture.  I bet he's fake.

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: Now go get dressed. We have things to do.

turns.speaker: UTOPIA
turns.text: Are we going to eat soon? I'm starved.

turns.speaker: UTOPIA
turns.text: Ooww!

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: Go on now. Do as I say.

turns.speaker: UTOPIA
turns.text: Cuervo...?

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: You're my woman, you understand? You don't let anybody take you away from me without a fight.

turns.speaker: UTOPIA
turns.text: I tried...

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: Nobody leaves Cuervo Jones. Not unless you give your life. You fight till you're dead. Then I forgive you.  Understand?  Understand?

turns.speaker: UTOPIA
turns.text: Yes...

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Come on, Cuervo. I delivered him, didn't I? All I'm asking for is what you promised.

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: We'll see.

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: Where is he?

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: He jumped. Down there.  He's dead, Cuervo. I did it. I killed Plissken.

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: Give it to me.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: You said I could be Vice-President, Cuervo. Your right-hand man.

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: Give it.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Sure, Cuervo, but look here. I've done it all, man. I killed Plissken, I got your girl back, I got it all. Just for you, Cuervo. Just for you.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: You're about to get hit, Cuervo. It's Plissken.

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: You told me he was dead.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: I thought he was, but he came back.

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: Where?

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Oh Cuervo...

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: It's so good to see you again.

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: Where's Plissken?

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: He's... near.

turns.speaker: CUERVO JONES
turns.text: You're stalling, Eddie.  Talk, you little gringo!

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Cuervo, look out behind you!

turns.speaker: SPINAL
turns.text: I wouldn't be doin' that, Snake.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: We have a little arrangement. Anything happens to me, you're dead.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: Wait a minute. All right. Hold on.

turns.speaker: SPINAL
turns.text: Cuervo Jones has more firepower than two armies. No one gets near him.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: Why should we leave? I love L.A. Where we gonna go? What's the payoff?

turns.speaker: SPINAL
turns.text: I'd like to get out but I don't have enough money.

turns.speaker: SPINAL
turns.text: Shit.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: You always were a loser, Plissken. Makin' things up as you go along. That's why I cut out on you in Cleveland. You're just a bum like the rest of us.

turns.speaker: SPINAL
turns.text: Where'd you get these rigs, Carjack?

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: My name is Hershe Hernandez, do you understand, cowboy?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: I need a favor.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: What's in it for me?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Wait a minute. I know that voice.  You're Carjack Malone.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: Not anymore.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: I was called away on urgent business, Snake.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Don't lie to me.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: All right, so I made another deal.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: I got a new deal for you.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: I'm already dead.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: I see your point. What's the favor?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Get me to Cuervo Jones. Get me to the Kingdom. I got one hour.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: Dream on, blue eye.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Say goodnight, Carjack.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: So what's the deal, gorgeous?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: We get the girl and the prototype. And we get out.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: I don't know, sounds thin to me.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: You want to stay here, while Cuervo Jones rules the world?

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: No, that sucks.  How are we getting out?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: I don't know yet.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: See you in hell, Snake.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: If I'm late, Carjack, don't start without me.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: She's overloaded! We're too heavy.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: Somebody get off!

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: I think we've burned off enough fuel. We may be lighter enough to hover. Just barely.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: Can you land?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: No. The right skid's broken. If I try to set it down she'll crash. I have to stay in a hoverwhile you jump off.  Hey, Carjack. We gotta hide the girl. Give her your dress.

turns.speaker: HERSHE
turns.text: My name is no longer Carjack. Will you please get that through your fucking head?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: How you doin' Plissken?  You like the watch?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: You assholes didn't bring me here to give me this for 20 years of dedicated service. What'ya want?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Shut up, Plissken.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: What's the little black box do?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Top secret. Only on a need to know.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: And I don't need to know. So fuck you, I'm goin' to Hollywood.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: That's right, big shot. Unless you do what we want you're not coming back.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: So what's the deal, huh? Go into L.A., find the President's daughter, secure the box, and bring 'em both out - and I'm free?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: That's the deal.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Tell the President to adopt. I think I'll like L.A.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Wait a minute, what are you talkin' about?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Having second thoughts?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Maybe. But you're not putting any shit in me this time.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: You don't understand. It's already in you.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Get this crap out of me.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: I guess we have a deal. Nice to be working with you, Plissken.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Call me Snake.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: I'll need to know more about this thing.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Only a handful of people are aware of its existence. Let's just say it's the ultimate defensive weapon.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Defense against what?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: There's a war about to be declared, or didn't you know?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Third World wants to live like we do - and they plan on taking what they want. The Cubans and Brazilians are ready to invade Miami. If the Africans and Colombians make a run at the border, we got a full scale attack on the United States.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: So what does this thing do?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: All you need to know is get it back here by 5 a.m.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Where do I put ashore?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Cahuenga Pass. Make your way up through the mountains toward the Hollywood Bowl. You should be able to pick up Utopia's tracer there.  Once you go inside, you're on your own.  You know what you have to do with the girl, don't you?  We have to spare this nation her trial - for treason.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: So you want me to take her out?  Is that an order from the President?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Let's just say it's what's best for the country.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: By the way - who gives me the anti-toxin?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: A medical team will be standing by.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Not you?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Good.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: She's in the green.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Lock fuel rods.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Locked.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Nuclear turbine to 75% power.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: 75% power.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Hands on switches and counting. 5...4...3...2...1. Launch.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Plissken...?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: I'm here.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Where's the submarine? It's disappeared off our screens.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: It's history. I gotta go.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Plissken - this is Malloy. Do you have the prototype?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Yeah, I got it.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Got a smoke?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: You're gonna have to learn to respect the law, Snake. The United States is a no- smoking nation. No smoking, no drinking, do drugs, no women unless you're married, no guns, no foul language. It's a brand new day for you, Snake.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: The name's Plissken.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: It's the President, for Christ's sake!

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: I give you my word. Put the prototype into my hands, and you're a free man.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Getting ready to invade.

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: So where's Plissken?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: The prototype appears to be armed, Mr. President.  Shall I begin evacuation?

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Does he know how to activate it?

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Well, yeah. All you have to do is push the button.

turns.speaker: MALLOY
turns.text: Relax, war hero. We took you for a ride, and you came through. Not bad for a dirtbag like you.

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: You're free, Plissken. But if you even so much as break wind on a country road I'll crush you like a bug.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: You're a star in your own right, you know that? Hey, I'm Map To The Stars Eddie. How you doin'?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Where'd they go?

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Man, I'd love to have your autograph, Snake.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Where are they?

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Who? You mean Cuervo Jones? He's the man with the juice, Snake. Got the President's daughter. Setting up a citywide truce. Big doings.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Location.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Cuervo's got a place near Venice, where the big birds fly. Nice digs, too. I've been there, y'know.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Too many people know where you're going, Snake. That's not good. Delgado and his men were back there waiting for you.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Delgado?

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Cuervo Jones' right-hand man. One tough hombre. You don't understand, Snake. Cuervo Jones wants to unify the island. We're on the move, man. Big time.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Stop the damn car.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: No way.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: I said pull over.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: All right. Anything for you, Snake.  Although I was going to take you to Cuervo Jones' place.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Where is it?

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Right over there.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Where are they going?

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Oh, man... You didn't have to hit me, Snake. I can help you.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Not yet.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: I could've helped you. We coulda made a deal with Cuervo. If you'd listen...

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Listen up. I need directions. Downtown. Somebody named Hershe.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Sure, Snake. No problem.  You gonna kill me?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Later.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: I couldn't help it, Snake. I had to shoot you. Cuervo made me do it, I swear to God, man.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Cease fire with the bullshit.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Right. Keep goin' straight. Two blocks down, turn right.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: How do you know all this?

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: I used to represent the guy who invented it. I swear to God, Snake. No bullshit.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Me too?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: We'll see.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Aw, come on, Snake.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Bluebacks. I'm not bullshittin'. I swear to God.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: I don't know about this thing.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Don't like it, don't come.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: I got an idea, Snake.  This looks like the prototype, right?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Yeah, kinda.

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: So maybe we can pull off a Texas switch on Cuervo.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: If he lets you get close enough.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Is that what I think it is?

turns.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
turns.text: Yeah. The place kept changing owners. Finally went bankrupt. That thing in Paris killed 'em.

turns.speaker: PENDEJO BOB
turns.text: What're you doing in here?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Looking to get out.

turns.speaker: PENDEJO BOB
turns.text: Good. I want you out. This is my sewer.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Which way?

turns.speaker: PENDEJO BOB
turns.text: Say, you need anything, Snake? Guns? Explosives? I can get you a crate of hellfire grenades, no problem - five hours.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Yeah. So how do I get to Venice?

turns.speaker: PENDEJO BOB
turns.text: All the sewers are collapsed under Venice. You have to go topside. Right up there.

turns.speaker: PIPELINE
turns.text: Kind of a bad neighborhood, Snake.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Which way to the Hollywood Bowl?

turns.speaker: PIPELINE
turns.text: Down that way.

turns.speaker: PIPELINE
turns.text: Could be a big one comin' any minute now...

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Where's... Cuervo Jones...?

turns.speaker: PIPELINE
turns.text: Long gone. You'll never catch up with him now, Snake.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Where?

turns.speaker: PIPELINE
turns.text: Anaheim. Headquarters for everything. The whole town's gonna be there. Things changin' fast around here, Snake. It's not the same as the old days, man.

turns.speaker: PIPELINE
turns.text: You ain't doin' so good, Snake. You need help.  You should talk to Hershe. She hates Cuervo. They used to be partners, but they split up.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Who?

turns.speaker: PIPELINE
turns.text: Hershe. She lives downtown with Mojo Dellasandro in the big boat. Down that way.

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: Hi, Snake. It's so great to meet you. My name's Taslima. I'm a fan of yours.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Are you crazy?

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: A little bit. But pretty soon I'm gonna be dead. So are you, Snake.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: What are they?

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: They live here, used to be like us. But after too many silicon implants, their muscles turned to jelly. The only way they survive is to have body parts transplanted over and over again.  Snake, nobody who comes into Beverly Hills gets out alive.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: No screamin' shit.

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: Oh no, it's the Doctor.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Who?

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: The Surgeon General of Beverly Hills.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Don't follow me.

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: You need help.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Like hell I do.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: This is a dead end.  You took us into a dead end!

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: I just thought you wanted to get away. I didn't know you wanted to go someplace.

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: Be careful of the bald cats. They live in these buildings.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: The what?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: How do we get out of here?

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: Sewers. Come on.

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: Snake - what is it?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: How the hell am I supposed to know? This is your damn city.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Why don't you get out of L.A.? Take a boat to China, take an airplane to Brazil?  Earthquakes, death, shit. Why do you stay?

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: I don't know. Somehow, I just can't leave.

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: I changed my mind. I'm going with you, wherever you're going.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: What the hell is this?

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: The freeway.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: I know that. There are people in some of these cars.

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: It's where they live. I guess after everything happened, they just needed to do what they'd always done before. During the daytime, they just pull down the shades on their windows and sleep.

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: What are you gonna do in Venice?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Find Cuervo Jones.

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: No! Stay away, Snake. He's mucho muerte.

turns.speaker: TASLIMA
turns.text: Run, Snake...They're coming.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Who?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: I can see you're real concerned about your daughter.

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Utopia is lost to me. My daughter is gone.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Well, I'll think it over.

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: You're running out of time.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: I've been doin' that all my life. Might as well do it in L.A. Everybody else there is.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Get ready, shitheads. We're comin' in.

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Thank God.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Where's the anti-toxin...?

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Give me the prototype.

turns.speaker: SPINAL
turns.text: Hey, what's going down, Snake?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: I'm looking for somebody.

turns.speaker: SPINAL
turns.text: Who ain't?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: You owe me. You left me holdin' everything back there in Cleveland.

turns.speaker: SPINAL
turns.text: Hershe, you were in Cleveland?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Yeah. With me and Texas Mike O'Shay.

turns.speaker: SPINAL
turns.text: All of us?

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: The President's promised to give whoever helps me 1 million dollars.

turns.speaker: SPINAL
turns.text: Yeah? Greenbacks? I got ten million of them.

turns.speaker: PLISSKEN
turns.text: Uh-uh. Bluebacks.

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: Is he coming?

turns.speaker: PERCEVAL
turns.text: He heard Lady Guenevere's request and he said nothing. That is all.

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: In the name of God, of St. Michael, and St. George, I make you a knight. Rise, Sir...

turns.speaker: PERCEVAL
turns.text: ...Perceval!

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: There is one thing left to do... Excalibur... And you must do it, Perceval. Leave my wounds, I command you.

turns.speaker: PERCEVAL
turns.text: I cannot--

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: --Take Excalibur. Find a pool of calm water and throw the sword into it.

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: When you threw it in, what did you see?

turns.speaker: PERCEVAL
turns.text: ...I saw nothing.

turns.speaker: PERCEVAL
turns.text: My King, I couldn't do it. Excalibur cannot be lost. Other men--

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: --By itself it is only a piece of steel. Its power comes from he who wields it. For now there is no one. Do as I have ordered!

turns.speaker: LANCELOT
turns.text: Good day to you, sir.

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: Move aside. This is the King's road, and the knights you joined arms against were his very own.

turns.speaker: LANCELOT
turns.text: I await the King himself. His knights are in need of training.

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: I am King, and this is Excalibur, sword of kings from the dawn of time. Who are you, and why do you block the way?

turns.speaker: LANCELOT
turns.text: I am Sir Lancelot of the Lake, from across the sea. I am the best knight in the whole of Christiandom, and I look for the king who is worthy of my sword's service.

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: --That is a wild boast. You lack a knight's humility.

turns.speaker: LANCELOT
turns.text: Not a boast, sir, but a curse.  Never have I met my match in joust or duel.

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: Move aside!

turns.speaker: LANCELOT
turns.text: I will not. You must retreat or prove your kingship in the test of arms, under the eyes of God.

turns.speaker: LANCELOT
turns.text: Yield. I have the advantage.

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: I will not.

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: Fight me from your horse or on foot, but fight me. Your avoidance mocks me.

turns.speaker: LANCELOT
turns.text: I sought only not to harm you, sir.

turns.speaker: LANCELOT
turns.text: Sir, your rage has unbalanced you. It seems you would fight to the death against a knight who is not your enemy, for a length of road you can ride around.

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: So be it, to the death.

turns.speaker: LANCELOT
turns.text: It is you, sir, who knows not the virtue of humility, as a true king must.

turns.speaker: ARTHUR
turns.text: Thanks to God, you are alive.

turns.speaker: LANCELOT
turns.text: I, the best knight in the world, bested! This is a great day, for my search is over. I love you, my King.
